reviewText: The dvds are top quality and Bear Grylls really puts together an educational and entertaining series of survival techniques in each episode on these seasons. Aside from the dvds themselves, the delivery service was amazingly fast. I ordered these with the expectation of receiving them in a week at best - I got them two days from order date for standard delivery. Way cool! Nice going Amazon!
Excellent show on survival and Bear Grylls is the best. If you are looking for a natural survivalist who will do or eat anything to survive, check out this series. Season 5 is also available
